text: Is HubSpot down?
Seems like :thinking_face:
<https://status.HubSpot.com/>
Everything is kicking to Beta
Over here it's not loading....

:rotating_light: Just found a weird behaviour which is probably related to cache, but I wanted to share it here to see if someone else has the same issue. If you create a folder/file in a specific location in HubSpot files, then you move it somewhere else and you create again the same folder/file in the same location as the previous one, HubSpot will tell you the folder/file already exists in this location even if I moved the previous one to another place and will block you from creating/adding it. This could be quite annoying. Did someone experience the same? Someone from HubSpot could confirm if this is a known issue?
:wave: <@UJX22GX0A> My name is Rahmona and I work at HubSpot. Which part of the product is this happening for you? e.g Landing Pages, Files etc?

:wave: <@U7KKA4QQM> <@UEC4VECRG> My name is Rahmona and I work at HubSpot. We have had some intermittent issues this morning which is preventing some users from accessing HubSpot. Our teams are investigating this issue and working hard to resolve it. Our status page will be updated as we progress through the issue: <https://status.HubSpot.com/>
If you have any immediate concerns please dont hesitate to let me know.

Hi <@UFBDBKQ1H>, nice to meet you! The issue in in HubSpot Files (File manager). I also noticed that if I add a file in the former location but in a new folder, it also appears in the folder I moved to another location.

Nice to meet you too and thank you confirming. I cant replicate this issue in my test portal. If its not too much hassle would it be possible to send me a short video to show how this is happening for you?
Feel free to direct messgage me the video too. I use Loom or Vidyard  to make short videos but you might have an app of choice for this.

I tried to replicate it again and couldn’t reproduce the error again, so I guess it was a one time error related with cache maybe. If it happens again I will get in touch with you :slightly_smiling_face: Thank you for the quick answer!

Hi. I am trying to connect an application to our HubSpot Account. I am a Super Admin but it is giving me the "Couldn't complete the connection. You don’t have permission to connect this integration." error. Could this be caused by the issues HubSpot is having today?

:wave: Daniel, My name is Rahmona and I work at HubSpot. I can help you out with this. Could you direct message me with your Hub ID and the name of the integration or App ID you are trying to connect and I can take a look for you?
Thank you <@UFBDBKQ1H>. We're also monitoring the status page, so far only a few users in our portal noticed the issues and we're managing them, but everything seems to be recovering
No problem at all and thanks for letting me know! If you notice this happening again please just let me know and I can jump in to help out! Have a nice rest of your day :sprocket-dance:
Anyone else getting logged out then taking a while to log back in before being kicked off again?
Seems to be an issue for all users apparently
Yep, login issues <https://status.HubSpot.com/>
We are still having issues on our end logging in.
Yup
Here too now...

Hey all, I kind of have a client emergency on my hands.
*Smart content/personalization is not working in their portal except for people who have newly filled out a form.* They bought into the CMS for this feature. Now they are fixing to launch today, and they are not happy :grimacing:
Personalization works in HubSpots preview as contact mode, but not in the wild

Hi <@UEC4VECRG> and <@U7KKA4QQM> we are still working on resolving this issue. Apologies for the interruption in service. The status page is best place to keep updated right now: <https://status.HubSpot.com/>
If you have any concerns please just let me know
Tks! We're here, there and everywhere :)
I wonder if this has something to do with the widespread login issues that have been going around this morning
this was happening 2 days ago
oof.  nevermind then

:wave: John, can you tell me which smart rule you are using for the smart content (list membership, Country etc) ? Also can you direct message me a link to a sample page with the smart content and a sample contact that is not seeing the smart content. TY
simple personalization is not working
and tracking in some pages
and the tracking code is there via `{{ standard_footer_includes }}`
Good news! Normal service has resumed!
Hi everyone, trying to save the page title and page URL where my form is hosted in to a contact field but i'm getting this jscript error`"Uncaught SyntaxError: Invalid or unexpected token"`
I've seen this same script working multiple times so i dont know what i may be doing wrong here
I’m not getting any error when I run it for in js console.  What browser did you see the error in?  Did it give you a line number?
So this is a California thing. When the CCPA took effect it rendered all previous cookies as “stolen by the cookie monster”
huh.  That’s super interesting.  Could you explain a little more?
Every contact that converted post 1/1/20 saw smart content no problem. Previous conversions will have to reconvert for this functionality. Was this announced anywhere?
WOW
This is pretty massive

It looks like HubSpot is automatically adding some inline styling to email headlines (font-size etc). Does anyone know where I can edit that? I don’t want to have to write !important all over the styles that I add in the head.
That’s insane. Did HubSpot purge all of that data based on IP or something?
that's unexpected... this is what i'm getting, failing on all browsers i tried
i uploaded the code here <https://app3.leadsruptive.com/whathub/test-hs-form.php>
